question: Which city is host to the Food and Hospitality fair- AAHAR 2020?
explanation:
The 35th edition of the Food and Hospitality fair AAHAR recently commenced in New Delhi. The five-day fair is being organized by India Trade Promotion Organisation (ITPO) in association with the Agriculture and Processed Food Products Development Authority (APEDA), Union Ministry of Food Processing Industries and some top industry consortiums.
Over 750 participants from India and abroad will participate in the fair and display a wide range of food products, equipment and hospitality related products.
